summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley between blocks 23 and 24, Northern Addition, being the alley from West Galer Street to West Lee Street, between 10th Avenue West and 11th Avenue West, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 119126 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
